title.zh: 股票期权和 RSU 指北

subtitle.en: Stock Options & RSUs Guide for Chinese Employees
subtitle.zh: 面向在外企工作的中国员工的股票期权和RSU指南

disclaimer.en: Educational purposes only. Please consult with financial and tax professionals for personalized advice.
disclaimer.zh: 仅供教育目的。请咨询金融和税务专业人士获取个性化建议。

title.zh: 外企股票期权和RSU不完全攻略

subtitle.en: Complete guide for Chinese employees working at foreign companies. Understand your stock compensation, tax implications, and make informed decisions.
subtitle.zh: 专为在外企工作的国内员工打造！从拿到期权到公司上市，从行权时机到税务筹划，手把手教你搞懂股票激励，避开常见坑点。

title.zh: 期权到底是什么？简单说就是...

description.en: Stock options give you the right (but not obligation) to buy company shares at a fixed price (strike price) for a certain period. If the company's stock price rises above your strike price, you can profit.
description.zh: 公司给你一个"购买权"，让你可以在未来某个时间，用今天约定好的价格买公司股票。如果到时候公司股价涨了，你就赚到了差价！关键是，你可以选择买或不买，没有强制要求。

example.en: Example: You have options with a $10 strike price. If the stock trades at $50, you can buy at $10 and immediately sell at $50, making $40 per share profit. Wait wait, can you really get $40k in your pocket?
example.zh: 举个例子：2022 年公司给你期权，约定价格是 10 美元一股。到了 2024 年公司上市，股价涨到 50 美元。这时你可以用 10 美元买入，立马 50 美元卖出，每股净赚 40 美元！如果有 1000 股期权，就是 4 万美元到手。等等，你真的能到手 4 万美元吗？

title.zh: 中国员工拿到的期权，实际情况是这样的
中国税收政策：没有美国式的优惠

no_iso_nso.zh: 🚫 中国没有 ISO/NSO 的区分，政策比较"一刀切"

exercise_tax.en: Taxed on exercise as salary income
exercise_tax.zh: 💰 行权时：股票的行权价和市价差额，计入"工资薪金所得"，按综合所得税率（3%–45%累进）缴纳个人所得税

sale_tax.en: 20% tax on capital gains when selling
sale_tax.zh: 📈 卖出时：如果股票之后还有涨幅，差额部分算"财产转让所得"，适用 20% 税率

no_holding_period.zh: ⏰ 没有美国那种"2 年 + 1 年"的税收优惠

tax_resident.en: Chinese tax residents pay Chinese taxes
tax_resident.zh: 🏠 如果是中国税收居民（在境内 ≥183 天），即使期权由美国母公司授予，仍然要在中国申报个税

rsu_alternative.zh: 🔄 有些公司会用 RSU（限制性股票单位）代替期权，RSU 在解禁时计入工资薪金所得征税

parent_company.en: Parent company options still subject to Chinese tax
parent_company.zh: 🌍 很多在华外企员工拿到的母公司期权，行权地/纳税地要看员工的税收居民身份

note.en: Note: This reflects Chinese tax law for stock options. Always consult with tax professionals for your specific situation.
note.zh: ⚠️ 注意：以上反映的是中国股票期权的税收政策。具体情况请咨询税务专业人士。

title.zh: 期权什么时候能用？看懂归属时间表

description.en: Most options vest over time, typically 4 years with a 1-year cliff:
description.zh: 企业一般不会一次性给你所有期权，而是分批"解锁"。典型的套路是 4 年解锁完，第一年是等待期（一股都拿不到），之后每年解锁一部分：

zh: 等待期，防止你刚入职就跑路
熬过第一年，开始有收获

note.en: The vesting schedule may vary depending on the company's policy. In previous years, stock options vested 25% annually over 4 years to reach 100%. However, in recent years, many companies have adopted more employee-friendly vesting schedules - for example, 25% after the first year, then vesting quarterly or monthly for the remaining three years to reach 100%. This design makes vesting more flexible and provides faster incentives for employees. Additionally, options have an expiration risk. If not exercised before expiration, they will expire. The typical expiration period is 10 years from grant, but some companies may extend it. Additionally, unvested options of terminated employees will be forfeited, and vested options must be exercised and sold within 6 months after termination. If not done, they will also expire.
note.zh: 归属时间表可能因公司政策不同而不同，前些年，4 年的期权成熟期每年成熟 25%，分四年完成 100%。但是近年来很多公司都改成了对员工更有好的归属时间表，比如还是第一年结束成熟 25%，之后每个季度或者是每个月都按比例成熟对应的比例，也是分四年完成 100%。这样的设计可以让期权的归属更加灵活，对员工的激励更快。同时需要额外注意的是，期权是会有过期风险的，再过期之前没有行权的话，期权就会归零。一般情况下，期权过期时间是在授予之日起 10 年，但是也有一些公司会根据实际情况延长过期时间。还有就是离职/被裁员员工的期权未授予部分会直接作废，已授予部分通常再 6 个月内需要行权和卖出，如果没有及时行权和卖出，也是归零。

title.zh: RSU - 直接给股票，比期权更直接！

description.en: RSUs are company shares given to employees that vest over time. Unlike options, you don't pay to exercise them. When they vest, you automatically own the shares and owe taxes on their full market value. In China, only companies that have gone public can offer RSUs. For pre-IPO companies, only options can be granted. However, in other countries, some unicorn companies can also choose to directly grant RSUs to employees.
description.zh: 公司直接承诺给你股票，到期自动到账，不用你掏钱买！比如公司说给你 1000 股 RSU，分 4 年给，每年给 250 股。时间一到，股票就自动转到你账户，你就是股东了。在国内，只有公司上市了才可以给员工 RSU。未上市只能是授予期权，但是在国外，一些独角兽企业也可以选择直接给员工 RSU。

key_difference.en: Key Difference: With RSUs, you own actual shares once vested. With options, you have the right to buy shares at a specific price.
key_difference.zh: 跟期权的区别：RSU 到期就是真股票，不用你操心；期权只是个"购买权"，还得你掏钱买。所以RSU更省心，期权风险更大但潜在收益也更高。

description.en: RSUs typically vest quarterly over 3-4 years
description.zh: RSU通常在 3-4 年内按季度归属

description.en: You owe income tax on the full market value when shares vest
description.zh: 股票归属时您需要按完整市场价值缴纳所得税

description.en: Additional gains/losses when you sell are treated as capital gains
description.zh: 出售时的额外收益/损失按资本利得处理

title.zh: 国内员工最关心的：税务怎么算？

content.en: Tax laws are complex and change frequently. This is educational information only. Always consult with qualified tax professionals in both countries.
content.zh: 税务问题水很深！中美两国税法都在变，这里只是科普。真要操作前，一定要找专业的税务师咨询，别拿自己的钱开玩笑。

title.en: Chinese Tax Reality for Stock Options
title.zh: 中国股票期权的税收现实

no_iso_nso.en: No ISO/NSO distinction - all treated the same
no_iso_nso.zh: 🚫 没有 ISO/NSO 区分：中国没有美国式的税收优惠，所有期权都按统一政策处理

exercise_tax.en: Taxed on exercise as salary income (3%-45% progressive rate)
exercise_tax.zh: 💰 行权即交税：行权价和市价差额按"工资薪金所得"征税，适用 3%-45% 的综合所得税率

sale_tax.en: 20% flat rate on capital gains when selling
sale_tax.zh: 📈 卖出时 20% 税率：股票卖出时的收益按"财产转让所得"征收 20% 固定税率，没有持有期优惠

no_holding_benefits.en: No 2+1 year holding period benefits like in the US
no_holding_benefits.zh: ⏰ 没有持有期优惠：中国没有美国那种"2年+1年"的税收优惠，持有时间长短不影响税率

vesting_tax.en: Taxed on vesting as salary income (3%-45% progressive rate)
vesting_tax.zh: 🎯 解禁即交税：RSU 解禁时按"工资薪金所得"征税，适用 3%-45% 的综合所得税率

sale_tax.en: 20% flat rate on capital gains when selling
sale_tax.zh: 📊 卖出时 20% 税率：RSU 卖出时的收益按"财产转让所得"征收 20% 固定税率

company_withholding.zh: 🤖 公司代扣代缴：公司通常会代扣代缴个人所得税，但可能需要个人补缴差额

title.zh: 外企期权在中国的税务处理

key_points.en: Key Points for Chinese Employees at Foreign Companies:
key_points.zh: 外企中国员工必须知道的要点：

tax_resident.en: Chinese tax residents (≥183 days in China) pay Chinese taxes
tax_resident.zh: 🏠 中国税收居民身份：在境内居住满 183 天就算中国税收居民，即使期权由美国母公司授予，也要在中国申报个税

parent_company_options.en: Parent company options still subject to Chinese tax law
parent_company_options.zh: 🌍 母公司期权也要交中国税：很多在华外企员工拿到的母公司期权，行权地/纳税地要看员工的税收居民身份

no_double_taxation.en: Tax treaties help avoid double taxation
no_double_taxation.zh: 🤝 避免双重征税：中美税收协定可以帮助避免双重征税，但需要正确申报和申请税收抵免

currency_conversion.en: Foreign currency income converted to RMB for tax calculation
currency_conversion.zh: 💱 汇率转换：美元收入要按汇率转成人民币计算税额，汇率波动会影响税负

rsu_preference.en: Many companies prefer RSUs over options in China
rsu_preference.zh: 🔄 公司偏好 RSU：很多公司在中国更愿意给 RSU 而不是期权，因为税务处理相对简单

complete_tax_chain.en: Complete tax chain from grant to final sale
complete_tax_chain.zh: 🔗 完整税务链条：从授予 → 行权/解禁交税 → 卖出再交税，每个环节都要考虑中国税务影响

tax_year.en: Consider tax year timing for exercises/sales
tax_year.zh: 考虑行权/出售的税年时机

residency_changes.en: Plan around changes in tax residency
residency_changes.zh: 围绕税务居民身份变化进行规划

detailed_records.en: Keep detailed records of all transactions
detailed_records.zh: 保留所有交易的详细记录

exchange_rates.en: Track exchange rates on transaction dates

agreements.en: Maintain grant agreements and vesting schedules
agreements.zh: 保留授予协议和归属时间表

ipo_soon.en: Company is likely to go public soon (lock in lower tax basis)
ipo_soon.zh: 公司可能很快上市（锁定较低税基）

appreciation_expected.en: You believe stock price will appreciate significantly
appreciation_expected.zh: 您认为股价将大幅上涨

holding_period.en: You want to start the capital gains holding period
holding_period.zh: 您想开始资本利得持有期

tax_optimization.en: Tax optimization: Exercise when income is lower to reduce tax burden
tax_optimization.zh: 税务优化：在收入较低的年份行权，减少税负

uncertain_prospects.zh: 对公司未来前景不确定

liquidity_needs.en: Need liquidity and can't afford exercise cost
liquidity_needs.zh: 需要流动性且无法承担行权成本

underwater.en: Stock price is below your strike price

expiration_risk.en: Approaching expiration but stock hasn't performed
expiration_risk.zh: 临近到期但股票表现不佳

title.zh: 卖出策略：什么时候卖最划算？
策略一：行权立即卖（无风险套现）

description.zh: 行权后马上卖出，锁定收益

lock_gains.zh: ✅ 收益确定：赚多少心里有数，不怕股价跌

minimize_risk.zh: ✅ 零持有风险：不用担心股价波动

higher_tax.zh: ❌ 税负集中：行权当期即需缴纳工资薪金个税（最高 45%），行权直接卖出没有价差，没有资本利得税

title.zh: 策略二：行权后持有（押注未来增长）

description.en: Exercise and hold for further sell
description.zh: 行权后持有，等待股价进一步上涨后再卖出

further_appreciation.zh: ✅ 收益潜力：如果股价继续涨，赚得更多

decline_risk.zh: ❌ 股价可能跌回甚至低于行权价，纸面财富缩水

double_tax.en: Double tax: exercise tax + capital gains tax
double_tax.zh: ❌ 双重征税：行权时先交工资个税，卖出时再交 20% 资本利得税

title.zh: 策略三：分批卖出（平衡风险收益）

description.zh: 行权后分批次卖出，不一次性清仓，避免踩在高点或低点

diversify_risk.zh: ✅ 风险分散：不把鸡蛋放一个篮子里

dollar_cost_averaging.zh: ✅ 平均收益：高低价都卖一些，收益更稳定

spread_tax.zh: ✅ 税务优化：在不同年度分散出售，避免当年综合所得税负过高

complex_tax_claim.en: Complex tax claim, need to plan selling timing and tax filing
complex_tax_claim.zh: ❌ 操作复杂：需要规划出售节奏与报税

diversification_key.en: Diversification is Key: Don't put all your wealth in company stock, even if you're optimistic about its prospects.
diversification_key.zh: 多元化是关键：不要将所有财富投入公司股票，即使您对其前景乐观。

total_exposure.en: Consider your total compensation exposure to company performance
total_exposure.zh: 考虑您的总薪酬对公司业绩的敞口

target_percentages.en: Set target percentages for company stock in your portfolio
target_percentages.zh: 为投资组合中的公司股票设定目标百分比

regular_rebalance.zh: 随着股价上涨定期重新平衡

exit_strategy.en: Have an exit strategy before you need it
exit_strategy.zh: 在需要之前制定退出策略

title.en: Ready to Calculate Your Options Value?
title.zh: 准备计算您的期权价值了吗？

subtitle.en: Use our calculator to estimate the value of your stock options and RSUs, and get personalized recommendations.
subtitle.zh: 使用我们的计算器估算您的股票期权和RSU价值，并获得个性化建议。

subtitle.en: Calculate accurate taxes based on your actual salary and get precise after-tax returns.
subtitle.zh: 基于您的实际工资收入计算准确税费，获得精确的税后收益预估。

title.en: What type of stock compensation do you have?
title.zh: 您拥有哪种类型的股票激励？

options_description.en: Need to pay to exercise, higher risk but higher potential return
options_description.zh: 需要掏钱行权，风险大收益高

rsu_description.en: Automatically receive shares when vested, more convenient
rsu_description.zh: 到期自动给股票，比较省心

description.en: Calculate your stock options value with accurate Chinese tax rates
description.zh: 基于中国税率精确计算您的期权收益

annual_salary.zh: 您的年工资收入（人民币）

annual_salary_help.en: Used to calculate progressive tax rate for option exercise
annual_salary_help.zh: 用于计算行权时的累进税率

exercise_price.zh: 行权时股价 / 当前股价（美元）

future_sale_price.zh: 未来卖出价（美元）- 可选

future_sale_help.en: Leave empty to calculate exercise-only scenario
future_sale_help.zh: 留空则只计算行权场景，填写则计算完整收益

title.zh: 中国个人所得税税率表

description.en: Your exercise income will be taxed at progressive rates
description.zh: 您的行权收入将按以下累进税率征税

taxable_income_formula.en: Taxable Income = Annual Income - 60,000 CNY basic deduction
taxable_income_formula.zh: 应纳税所得额 = 年收入 - 6 万元基本减除费用

marginal_rate_explanation.en: Option exercise income is taxed at marginal rates, i.e., additional tax burden on your current income
marginal_rate_explanation.zh: 期权行权收益会按边际税率计算，即在您当前收入基础上的额外税负

capital_gains_rate.en: Capital gains tax (when selling) is calculated at a fixed 20% rate
capital_gains_rate.zh: 资本利得税（卖出时）按固定 20% 计算

title.en: Step 3: Calculate Capital Gains Tax (if applicable)
title.zh: 第三步：计算资本利得税（如适用）
第四步：计算最终净收益

option_income_distribution.en: Option income distribution across tax brackets:
option_income_distribution.zh: 期权收益在各税率档次的分布：

exercise_gain_usd.en: Exercise Gain (USD) = (Exercise Price - Strike Price) × Shares
exercise_gain_usd.zh: 行权收益（美元）= (行权时股价 - 行权价) × 股数

exercise_gain_cny.en: Exercise Gain (CNY) = Exercise Gain (USD) × Exchange Rate
exercise_gain_cny.zh: 行权收益（人民币）= 行权收益（美元) × 汇率

marginal_tax_rate.en: Marginal Tax Rate = Based on your total income bracket
marginal_tax_rate.zh: 边际税率 = 基于您的总收入所在税率档次

exercise_tax.en: Exercise Tax = Exercise Gain (CNY) × Marginal Tax Rate
exercise_tax.zh: 行权税费 = 行权收益（人民币）× 边际税率

capital_gains.en: Capital Gains = (Sale Price - Exercise Price) × Shares × Exchange Rate
capital_gains.zh: 资本利得 = (卖出价 - 行权价) × 股数 × 汇率

capital_gains_tax.zh: 资本利得税 = 资本利得 × 20%

total_tax.en: Total Tax = Exercise Tax + Capital Gains Tax
total_tax.zh: 总税费 = 行权税费 + 资本利得税

net_gain.en: Net Gain = Total Gain - Total Tax
net_gain.zh: 净收益 = 总收益 - 总税费

description.en: Calculate your RSU value with accurate Chinese tax rates
description.zh: 基于中国税率精确计算您的RSU收益

annual_salary.zh: 您的年工资收入（人民币）

annual_salary_help.en: Used to calculate progressive tax rate for RSU vesting
annual_salary_help.zh: 用于计算RSU归属时的累进税率

future_sale_price.zh: 未来卖出价（美元）- 可选

future_sale_help.en: Leave empty to calculate vesting-only scenario
future_sale_help.zh: 留空则只计算归属场景，填写则计算完整收益

title.en: Step 3: Calculate Capital Gains Tax (if applicable)
title.zh: 第三步：计算资本利得税（如适用）
第四步：计算最终净收益

rsu_income_distribution.en: RSU income distribution across tax brackets:
rsu_income_distribution.zh: RSU收益在各税率档次的分布：

vesting_value_usd.en: Vesting Value (USD) = Vested Shares × Vesting Price
vesting_value_usd.zh: 归属价值（美元）= 已归属股数 × 归属时股价

vesting_value_cny.en: Vesting Value (CNY) = Vesting Value (USD) × Exchange Rate
vesting_value_cny.zh: 归属价值（人民币）= 归属价值（美元) × 汇率

vesting_tax.en: Vesting Tax = RSU Value (CNY) × Marginal Tax Rate
vesting_tax.zh: 归属税费 = RSU价值（人民币）× 边际税率

capital_gains.en: Capital Gains = (Sale Price - Vesting Price) × Shares × Exchange Rate
capital_gains.zh: 资本利得 = (卖出价 - 归属价) × 股数 × 汇率

capital_gains_tax.zh: 资本利得税 = 资本利得 × 20%

total_tax.en: Total Tax = Vesting Tax + Capital Gains Tax
total_tax.zh: 总税费 = 归属税费 + 资本利得税

net_gain.en: Net Gain = Total Gain - Total Tax
net_gain.zh: 净收益 = 总收益 - 总税费

low.zh: 低 - 短期内不需要现金

medium.zh: 中等 - 有一些即将到来的支出

adequate.zh: 充足 - 6 个月以上支出

message.en: Given your high liquidity needs, exercising and selling options could provide immediate cash flow.
message.zh: 鉴于您的高流动性需求，行权并出售期权可以提供即时现金流。

message.en: Pre-IPO companies often see significant gains. Consider holding if you can afford the risk.
message.zh: IPO前公司通常会有显著收益。如果您能承担风险，请考虑持有。

message.en: With less than 1 year to expiration, consider exercising soon to avoid losing value.
message.zh: 距离到期不足1年，请考虑尽快行权以避免价值损失。

message.en: Consider selling vested RSUs to meet liquidity needs and diversify your portfolio.
message.zh: 考虑出售已归属的RSU以满足流动性需求并分散投资组合。

message.en: Mature companies may have limited upside. Consider selling to diversify investments.
message.zh: 成熟公司可能上涨空间有限。考虑出售以分散投资。

message.en: Exercise costs may strain your finances. Consider cashless exercise or waiting for better liquidity.
message.zh: 行权成本可能会使您的财务紧张。考虑无现金行权或等待更好的流动性。

message.en: Diversification is key. Don't put all your wealth in company stock, regardless of your optimism.
message.zh: 多元化是关键。无论您多么乐观，都不要将所有财富投入公司股票。

disclaimer.en: This is educational guidance only. Always consult with financial and tax professionals before making decisions.
disclaimer.zh: 这仅为教育指导。在做决定前请务必咨询金融和税务专业人士。

subtitle.en: Learn about the basics of stock options, RSUs, and tax implications in our comprehensive guide.
subtitle.zh: 在我们的综合指南中了解股票期权、RSU和税务影响的基础知识。
